text: Nikolai Victorovich Podgorny (18 February [O.S. 5 February] 1903 â€“ 12 January 1983) was a Soviet statesman. He served as the Chairman of the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet, the head of state of the Soviet Union, from 1965 to 1977. Category:1903 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Soviet politicians
title: Nikolai Podgorny
